content:
• Simmons pillow top mattress
  • 100% cotton 300-thread count linens
  • Deluxe goose feather down comforter
  • Blackout shades
  • USB outlets
  • Bedside LCD Reading Lamps
  • Laptop-sized safe
  • 49'' LG HDTV                                
  • Google Chromecast
  • Mini Refrigerator
  • The Coffee Bean Coffee 
  • Granite bathroom vanity
  • Adjustable height Toto Aerojet Hand Shower
  •  Towel Warmer
  • All natural plant based EO bath products
  • Reusable water bottle with filling stations throughout the hotel
  • Blazing fast Autobahn Wi-Fi throughout the hotel – unlimited device connections
